node.content-desc: Michael McFaul @McFaul Verified. If Putin fears he is losing Crimea, he will negotiate. Therefore, we in the West should give Kyiv the weapons they need to threaten Crimea, including first and foremost, ATACMs. The sooner we do, the faster this awful war will end.. Elon Musk replied. 1 day ago. 4745 replies. 3344 retweets. 26346 likes. 10280622 verified views.

node.text: If Putin fears he is losing Crimea, he will negotiate. Therefore, we in the West should give Kyiv the weapons they need to threaten Crimea, including first and foremost, ATACMs. The sooner we do, the faster this awful war will end.

node.content-desc:
Elon Musk @elonmusk Verified. Replying to ﻿‎@McFaul﻿. Ukraine needs to be in max defense mode. Major Russian offensive coming.
Do you know how many casualties each side has taken?. 20 hours ago. 4619 replies. 2719 retweets. 37262 likes. 10125511 verified views.

node.text:
